Title: ASP.NET C# Developer (3-4 year experience) at Kandivali
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.
Testing the code you write and what is already written (sometimes) and how it integrates with Probench preferably automated
Content writing for users to guide them on how to use the software change, you or a team member made.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹550,000.00 to ₹700,000.00 /year

Title: ASP.NET C# Developer (3-4 year experience) at Kandivali
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.
Testing the code you write and what is already written (sometimes) and how it integrates with Probench preferably automated
Content writing for users to guide them on how to use the software change, you or a team member made.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹550,000.00 to ₹700,000.00 /year
Location:
Mumbai, Maharashtra (Required)

What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write

Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices

Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.

Title: Web Application Developer
Description:
Company Description

TRS, starting off as an OMR specialist three decades back, today, has transformed into India’s leading end-to-end solution provider in the examination vertical. Our commitment towards providing quality results to our clients, has helped us grow into what we are today.

Innovation is the strongest driving force for TRS and this has enabled us to consistently pioneer new solutions, thereby keeping ahead of the competition in this line of work. TRS is the sole Indian SME company in this niche sector to have a strong R&D team. In recent years, TRS has indigenously developed a diverse product portfolio and has registered for two patents.

Our solutions, over the years have permeated all over and today many of our ideas have been standardised and used by top educational boards/institutes across the country. One example is the usage of barcodes for dummy numbering in universities, which was introduced by TRS and today this method is being popularly followed all over India. Introducing OMR shading in the front page of booklets was also a TRS innovation, which has successfully helped improve the quality of result publication for many institutions.

The strong domain expertise coupled with high end R&D competence, gives TRS an edge over others. Ensuring high quality standards has always been a hallmark of TRS and this is clearly seen in the number of clients who have stayed on with us over the years and have adopted our solutions fruitfully.

With a committed team of expert personnel to handle high security work, the reputation of TRS has always been an ever rising curve. Keeping up to that, TRS aims to be in constant pursuit of transforming evaluation methods in the education sector, which in turn would help create high quality human capital for the future of our country.

Technical knowledge in areas such as client-side components, server-side languages, web application frameworks and database management systems, Web security.

Title: ASP.NET C# Developer (3-4 year experience) at Kandivali
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.
Testing the code you write and what is already written (sometimes) and how it integrates with Probench preferably automated
Content writing for users to guide them on how to use the software change, you or a team member made.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write

Title: ASP.NET C# Developer (3-4 year experience) at Kandivali
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.
Testing the code you write and what is already written (sometimes) and how it integrates with Probench preferably automated
Content writing for users to guide them on how to use the software change, you or a team member made.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹550,000.00 to ₹700,000.00 /year
Location:
Mumbai, Maharashtra (Required)

Title: ASP.NET C# Developer (3-4 year experience) at Kandivali
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.
Testing the code you write and what is already written (sometimes) and how it integrates with Probench preferably automated
Content writing for users to guide them on how to use the software change, you or a team member made.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write

What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write

Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.

What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Title: ASP.NET C# Developer (3-4 year experience) at Kandivali
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.
Testing the code you write and what is already written (sometimes) and how it integrates with Probench preferably automated
Content writing for users to guide them on how to use the software change, you or a team member made.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹550,000.00 to ₹700,000.00 /year
Location:
Mumbai, Maharashtra (Required)

Title: ASP.NET C# Developer (3-4 year experience) at Kandivali
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.
Testing the code you write and what is already written (sometimes) and how it integrates with Probench preferably automated
Content writing for users to guide them on how to use the software change, you or a team member made.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹550,000.00 to ₹700,000.00 /year

Mumbai, Maharashtra (Required)

Title: ASP.NET C# Developer (3-4 year experience) at Kandivali
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.
Testing the code you write and what is already written (sometimes) and how it integrates with Probench preferably automated
Content writing for users to guide them on how to use the software change, you or a team member made.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write

Description:
Job Overview
We are looking for a Web Designer who strives to deliver an exceptional look, feel and specialized portrayal of a client’s business through his knowledge of website designing.
You should create a unique brand identity for our client’s business. As a Web Designer, you should believe in sustainable designing solutions with the best aesthetics.
You should be talented enough to produce web design which is par with the content. You should have the skills to represent the client’s business objectives with powerful web design.
If you can make responsive web designs that are user-friendly and highly customized with structured information, we would like to meet you.
Responsibilities
Undertake designing assignments entirely from the stage of conception to the final completion.

Coordinate with the design team and web developers.

Track the latest trends and techniques concerning the field of web designing.

Highly proficient in Photoshop, HTML, CSS, and PHP.

Title: ASP.NET C# Developer (3-4 year experience) at Kandivali
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.
Testing the code you write and what is already written (sometimes) and how it integrates with Probench preferably automated
Content writing for users to guide them on how to use the software change, you or a team member made.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write

In this role, you will be responsible for developing and implementing user interface components using React.js concepts and workflows such as Redux, Flux, and Webpack. You will also be responsible for profiling and improving front-end performance and documenting our front-end codebase.
To ensure success as a React.js Developer, you should have in-depth knowledge of JavaScript and React concepts, excellent front-end coding skills, and a good understanding of progressive web applications. Title: Web Development Internship
Description:
About the company:
As a company or an individual, one may be sitting on a billion-dollar idea or a requirement, which may change the world forever. However, a lack of understanding of the software industry derails the execution and in turn, fails a rather genius idea. Unaware of the perils of this complex industry, you end up burning a lot of cash and an even more resourceful thing - time. We are a team of Product Managers with experience of working with people with different industries with unique problems. We also possess all the skills, tools and knowledge of the processes required to convert the idea into a tech product and then sell this tech product to customers. Delivering the product faster and cheaper is a need of the hour and having an in-house team of Developers, Designers, Testers, Digital Marketers and Business developers gives us that leverage. Our Mission is to get things done!

â€¢ Write well designed, testable, efficient code by using best software development practices. â€¢ Create website layout/user interface by using standard HTML/CSS practices. â€¢ Integrate data from various back-end services and databases using APIs. â€¢ Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs and scope of work. â€¢ Create and maintain software documentation using postman and GIT. â€¢ Be responsible for maintaining, expanding, and scaling the websites.

Title: PHP Developer
Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a PHP Developer responsible for managing back-end services and the interchange of data between the server and the users. Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic, definition and maintenance of the central database, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application. Therefore, a basic understanding of front-end technologies is necessary as well.
Responsibilities
· Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers
· Build efficient, testable, and reusable PHP modules
· Solve complex performance problems and architectural challenges
· Integration of data storage solutions, good knowledge of Amazon AWS server management.
· Create APIs for the various Apps that we develop and ensure smooth functioning of the Apps
Skills And Qualifications
· Strong knowledge of PHP web frameworks, such as Laravel, Yii, etc. Knowledge of Yii framework is a must
· Understanding the fully synchronous behavior of PHP
· Understanding of MVC design patterns
· Basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3
· Knowledge of object-oriented PHP programming
· Understanding accessibility and security compliance
· Strong knowledge of the common PHP or web server exploits and their solutions
· Understanding fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
· User authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments
· Integration of multiple data sources and databases into one system
· Familiarity with limitations of PHP as a platform and its workarounds
· Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes
· Familiarity with SQL/NoSQL databases and their declarative query languages
· Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
· Good understanding of WebRTC platform and its integration

Title: ASP.NET C# Developer (3-4 year experience) at Kandivali
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.
Testing the code you write and what is already written (sometimes) and how it integrates with Probench preferably automated
Content writing for users to guide them on how to use the software change, you or a team member made.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹550,000.00 to ₹700,000.00 /year

Mumbai, Maharashtra (Required)

Title: Front End Web Developer
Description:
ABOUT THE COMPANY
‘I AM IN’, which is an acronym of "I am investing", is a platform to Help Parents and Kids become money smart in an exciting way.
Our app focuses on the 6 most important quotients of Financial Literacy: Spend, Save, Donate, Invest, Earn & Learn.
1) Spend: Let the kid take a decision on their Expenses (inculcate smart spending)
2) Save: They Decide Goals and Save for them using various features of the Application
3) Donate: Doing their bit for the Society
4) Invest: Let Money grow Money and help them achieve their goals
5) Earn: Earn rewards from parents by completing the tasks given to them.
6) Learn: Teach kids about financial literacy by providing content applicable to their age group through Theories, Videos, Case studies of Investors, DIY Activities & much more.
Requirements
FRONT-END DEVELOPER
We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming.
- Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application.
- You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Write well designed, testable, efficient code by using best software development practices
- Create website layout/user interface by using standard HTML/CSS/JavaScript practices
- Make elegant and beautiful website according to the UI Designs in a matter of 2-3 days
- Integrate smooth and efficient animations in website
- Website should be mobile-responsive and quality of animations and visual effects should also be retained in mobile version
- Work with smooth scrolling, animations linked with scrolling and parts of graphic assets, story-line kind of website
- Integrate data from various back-end services and databases
- Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs
- Be responsible for maintaining, expanding, and scaling our product
- Stay plugged into emerging technologies/industry trends and apply them into operations and activities
- Cooperate with graphic designers to match visual design intent
QUALIFICATIONS AND SKILLS:
- Must be proficient/expert in CSS and JavaScript
- Proven working experience in frontend development
- Top-notch programming skills and in-depth knowledge of modern HTML/CSS/JavaScript
- A solid understanding of how web applications work including security, session management, and best development practices
- Aggressive problem diagnosis and creative problem-solving skills
- Strong organizational skills to juggle multiple tasks within the constraints of timelines and budgets with business acumen
- Ability to work and thrive in a fast-paced environment, learn rapidly, and master diverse web technologies and techniques.
BENEFITS
You should join us if you want to be part of a mission-driven company. If you believe that financial literacy is a life-changing skill then help us spread the awareness. Join us and make yourself part of this amazing journey.
Perks
1. Competitive Salary
2. Flexible work-hours
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹300,000.00 to ₹600,000.00 /year
Experience:
Programming / HTML: 1 year (Required)
total work: 1 year (Required)
CSS: 1 year (Required)
javascript: 1 year (Required)

Mumbai, Maharashtra (Required)

Title: ASP.NET C# Developer (3-4 year experience) at Kandivali
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.
Testing the code you write and what is already written (sometimes) and how it integrates with Probench preferably automated
Content writing for users to guide them on how to use the software change, you or a team member made.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹550,000.00 to ₹700,000.00 /year
Location:
Mumbai, Maharashtra (Required)

Title: ASP.NET C# Developer (3-4 year experience) at Kandivali
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.
Testing the code you write and what is already written (sometimes) and how it integrates with Probench preferably automated
Content writing for users to guide them on how to use the software change, you or a team member made.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹550,000.00 to ₹700,000.00 /year
Location:
Mumbai, Maharashtra (Required)

Title: ASP.NET C# Developer (3-4 year experience) at Kandivali
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.
Testing the code you write and what is already written (sometimes) and how it integrates with Probench preferably automated
Content writing for users to guide them on how to use the software change, you or a team member made.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write

Mumbai, Maharashtra (Required)

Title: Web Application Developer
Description:
Company Description

TRS, starting off as an OMR specialist three decades back, today, has transformed into India’s leading end-to-end solution provider in the examination vertical. Our commitment towards providing quality results to our clients, has helped us grow into what we are today.

Innovation is the strongest driving force for TRS and this has enabled us to consistently pioneer new solutions, thereby keeping ahead of the competition in this line of work. TRS is the sole Indian SME company in this niche sector to have a strong R&D team. In recent years, TRS has indigenously developed a diverse product portfolio and has registered for two patents.

Our solutions, over the years have permeated all over and today many of our ideas have been standardised and used by top educational boards/institutes across the country. One example is the usage of barcodes for dummy numbering in universities, which was introduced by TRS and today this method is being popularly followed all over India. Introducing OMR shading in the front page of booklets was also a TRS innovation, which has successfully helped improve the quality of result publication for many institutions.

The strong domain expertise coupled with high end R&D competence, gives TRS an edge over others. Ensuring high quality standards has always been a hallmark of TRS and this is clearly seen in the number of clients who have stayed on with us over the years and have adopted our solutions fruitfully.

With a committed team of expert personnel to handle high security work, the reputation of TRS has always been an ever rising curve. Keeping up to that, TRS aims to be in constant pursuit of transforming evaluation methods in the education sector, which in turn would help create high quality human capital for the future of our country.

Job Description

Technical knowledge in areas such as client-side components, server-side languages, web application frameworks and database management systems, Web security.

Qualifications

Qualification: Graduate in Computer Science

Skill set: Web Application Developer, Visual Studio .net 2010 or Higher, MVC, Javascript, CSS, .Net Frameworks, SQL Server 2010 or Higher

Hindi Typing skill

Experience: 2+Yrs

Additional Information

Title: ASP.NET C# Developer (3-4 year experience) at Kandivali
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.
Testing the code you write and what is already written (sometimes) and how it integrates with Probench preferably automated
Content writing for users to guide them on how to use the software change, you or a team member made.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹550,000.00 to ₹700,000.00 /year
Location:
Mumbai, Maharashtra (Required)

Therefore, a commitment to problem-solving, sophisticated design and quality product is important.

Title: ASP.NET C# Developer (3-4 year experience) at Kandivali
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.
Testing the code you write and what is already written (sometimes) and how it integrates with Probench preferably automated
Content writing for users to guide them on how to use the software change, you or a team member made.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹550,000.00 to ₹700,000.00 /year

Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write

Title: UI/UX Developer
Description:
Company Description
We have a core set of technologies we work with on a daily basis - the ones we know are scalable, dependant and forward thinking. We always lead with these.
We will however always work with customers regardless of their existing tech stack or on going requirements.

Job Description
We are looking for a UI/UX Designer to turn our software into easy-to-use products for our clients.
UI/UX Designer responsibilities include gathering user requirements, designing graphic elements and building navigation components. To be successful in this role, you should have experience with design software and wireframe tools. If you also have a portfolio of professional design projects that includes work with web/mobile applications, we’d like to meet you.
Ultimately, you’ll create both functional and appealing features that address our clients’ needs and help us grow our customer base.
Responsibilities
Gather and evaluate user requirements in collaboration with product managers and engineers
Illustrate design ideas using storyboards, process flows and sitemaps
Design graphic user interface elements, like menus, tabs and widgets
Build page navigation buttons and search fields
Develop UI mockups and prototypes that clearly illustrate how sites function and look like
Create original graphic designs (e.g. images, sketches and tables)
Prepare and present rough drafts to internal teams and key stakeholders
Identify and troubleshoot UX problems (e.g. responsiveness)
Conduct layout adjustments based on user feedback
Adhere to style standards on fonts, colors and images

Qualifications
Proven work experience as a UI/UX Designer or similar role
Portfolio of design projects
Knowledge of wireframe tools (e.g. Wireframe.cc and InVision)
Up-to-date knowledge of design software like Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop
Team spirit; strong communication skills to collaborate with various stakeholders
Good time-management skills
Minimum 1 year of working experience
BSC/MCA/BE in computer science, IT
Additional Information
We believe that delivering product is worthless unless it’s successful. We work with our clients to ensure what we ship results in happy customers.

Title: ASP.NET C# Developer (3-4 year experience) at Kandivali
Description:
Note: The job location is at Kandivali near the station (Mumbai) only apply if your travel time is less than 45 minutes. Until there is lockdown we will be working from home.
Job Summary
Think, yes think on solving the problems with clean technical design and applying better practices
Writing code in direction of product improvement or keeping it running as expected
Reading and understanding source code's syntax and semantics of Probench.
Testing the code you write and what is already written (sometimes) and how it integrates with Probench preferably automated
Content writing for users to guide them on how to use the software change, you or a team member made.
Responsibilities and Duties
Working with our web-based online benchmark platform named Probench.
Understanding the changes asked by clients or new features added as part of product development.
Be an active team member and communicate all news bad or good quickly.
Enjoy learning new technology
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
Good with C# and Asp.Net
Good with Javascript
Knowledge on TSQL
Willing to learn XSLT
Benefits
5 days work week
10% Training time during working hours
Fast Track Carrer growth opportunity based on a measured work task.
Exposure to work with International Clients only
Flexible Work Hours
Casual Office Environment
What would your workday look like?
Most part of your day, you will be writing clean code and refactoring legacy code. You will often write it with Test Driven Development. That means you will write clean tests.
You will also take part in biweekly standup calls in which we plan for the next 2 days. We believe each one of us should get an uninterrupted day to plan and write good quality code.
You will also get allocated time to write documentation and time to craft your skills by learning better ways to write code. It will be a part of your job to coach and learn from team members.
Will you be working at client side?
Never, because we are a product company and our customer support is online. We serve our clients from Europe via ticketing system, emails and chats. If you aspire to take leadership role you will communicate with clients in requirement calls or answer technical questions in client calls.
How many days a week we work?
We work 5 days a week.
Will, there be any experienced lead to help me when you get stuck?
Yes, we have 2 senior members with a collective experience of 30+ years in software to help you guide in case you find any challenge. We also follow pair programming way to get through performance-related challenges or implementing new features of programming language be it C# or JavaScript.
We believe that progress is better than perfect. Here are a few links of videos that share our programming philosophy Executing The Basics Brilliantly https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NGmLLLEHCmI , Programming 101 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1CuAiKdBQs , Rules of Simple Design https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooIy0yk44t8 and I find bugs too boring to write https://www.deconstructconf.com/2017/arlo-belshee-i-find-bugs-too-boring-to-write
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹550,000.00 to ₹700,000.00 /year
Location:
Mumbai, Maharashtra (Required)

About the Company:
ISchoolConnect is an online platform that makes the University Admissions process hassle-free, fun and accessible to students around the globe. Using our unique AI technology, we allow students to apply to multiple universities with a single application. iSchoolConnect also connects with institutions worldwide and aids them in the transformation of their end-to-end admission processes using our various cutting-edge use cases. Our technologies include the Conversational AI chatbot, Document Grader, Video Interview Analyzer, and a Single application use case which aids institutions with International Enrollment Management.
Job Description:
We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.
iSchoolConnect's Mission:
To make International Education and University Admissions process hassle-free, fun and accessible to students around the globe
For more information visit: https://ischoolconnect.com/

Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3

Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery
Good understanding of at least one of advanced JavaScript libraries and frameworks such as AngularJS, KnockoutJS, BackboneJS, ReactJS etc.
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX.
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.

Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that application will adhere to them. * Ability to work in a dynamic environment using agile methodologies
Good to Have:
